Mount_Vernon.Russian Mission School in New York:
The Russian Mission School in New York (Russian: Средняя школа с углублённым изучением иностранного языка при Постоянном представительстве РФ при ООН в Нью-Йорке) is a Russian overseas school located on the grounds of the Russian Mission Residency in the Riverdale community of Bronx borough of New York City, New York. It is affiliated with the Permanent Mission of the Russian Federation to the United Nations, and is operated by the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
As of 1986 students from this school had meetings with local high school students.
